name: Heal Wounds
in_game_description: Restore HP to all allies

name: Holy Light
in_game_description: Inflict light-based damage on a single foe

name: Sheltering Veil
in_game_description: Augment one ally's elemental defence for 2 turns
notes: Grants E.Def up buff (2/3x elemental damage taken). Does not affect healing amount

name: Luminescence
in_game_description: Deal light-based damage to all foes

name: Heal More
in_game_description: Restore a large amount of HP to all allies

name: Reflective Veil
in_game_description: Grant a single ally the ability to reflect one elemental attack
notes: Damage is negated and strikes opponent, lasts until used.

name: Revive
in_game_description: Revive all incapacitated allies
notes: *When unboosted, there is no healing effect after revival, so this value doesn't exist. This means unboosted, everyone revived is left at 1 HP.

name: Aelfric's Auspices
in_game_description: For 3 turns, skills performed by a single chosen ally will trigger twice. (This will not affect other divine skills)

name: Fireball
in_game_description: Deal fire damage to all foes

name: Icewind
in_game_description: Deal ice damage to all foes

name: Lightning Bolt
in_game_description: Deal lightning damage to all foes

name: Analyze
in_game_description: Reveal the HP and 1 weakness of a single foe
notes: Current/Max HP is displayed briefly at the top of the screen while the move is used. Max boost does reveal 5 weaknesses, the in game description claims 4 and is wrong.

name: Fire Storm
in_game_description: Deal fire damage to all foes twice
notes: Note that max boost is +91 instead of +81 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Blizzard
in_game_description: Deal ice damage to all foes twice
notes: Note that max boost is +91 instead of +81 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Lightning Blast
in_game_description: Deal lightning damage to all foes twice
notes: Note that max boost is +91 instead of +81 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Alephan's Enlightenment
in_game_description: For 3 turns, spells cast by a single chosen ally that usually target all foes will instead be focued on a single foe at increased intensity
notes: Damage multiplier is x2 while active. See Convergence flag on right for which moves are affected.

name: Collect
in_game_description: Collect money (leaves) from a single foe.
notes: Odds of success vary with enemy HP. Success % rate is: (100 - 100 x enemy current HP / enemy max HP) + Ability Ratio bonus. Amount stolen is determined by the enemy.

name: Tradewinds
in_game_description: Deal heavy wind damage to a single foe

name: Rest
in_game_description: Restore one's own HP and SP, and cure status ailments
notes: HP healing values shown. Restores a fixed 25 SP, 50 SP, 75 SP and 100 SP at each boost level respectively, and also cures status conditions

name: Trade Tempest
in_game_description: Deal wind damage to all foes.

name: Donate BP
in_game_description: Grant 1 BP to an ally.

name: Sidestep
in_game_description: Dodge a single physical attack with a 100% success rate
notes: Lasts until used. Used to avoid any physical attack, even if you would have dodged anyway.

name: Hired Help
in_game_description: Pay money (leaves) to summon hired help to the battlefield
notes: Attacks once per BP spent. Has several options available, details below

name: Bifelgan's Bounty
in_game_description: Unleash a non-elemental attack on a single foe and receive leaves equivalent to the damage dealt
notes: Cannot earn more leaves than enemies remaining HP. Description is misleading, it is an elemental attack of no specific element. It erronously has the physical attack icon in game rather than the elemental attack icon.

name: Hired Help Mercenary
in_game_description: Unlease a sword attack on all foes, and grant increased physical defence to all allies
notes: Grants whole party P.Def Up for 2/4/6/8 turns, increasing with boost level. Uses Mercenary's stats, notably 130 P.Atk, 600 accuracy and 106 critical

name: Hired Help Bandit
in_game_description: Unleash an axe attack on all foes
notes: Uses Bandit's stats, notably 200 P.Atk, 600 accuracy and 524 critical.

name: Hired Help Dancer
in_game_description: Unleash a dagger attack on all foes that has a chance of inflicting status ailments.
notes: Each attack also has a 5%/10%/20%/30% chance to Poison, Blind, confuse and/or Sleep, increasing with boost level. Each debuff lasts 3 turns per time it is applied and can apply multiple times per use at high boost. Uses Dancer's stats, notably 250 P.Atk, 600 accuracy and 131 critical.

name: Hired Help Cleric
in_game_description: Deal light-based damage to all foes.
notes: Uses Cleric's own stats, notably 320 M.Atk

name: Hired Help Veteran Soldier
in_game_description: Unleash a powerful sword attack on all foes
notes: Uses Veteran's own stats, notably 480 P.Atk, 600 Acc and 524 critical. Estimated overall multiplier after this of 2.18

name: Level Slash
in_game_description: Attack all foes with a sword

name: Abide
in_game_description: Increase the user's physical attack strength for 3 turns
notes: Grants P.Atk up buff (1.5x physical damage)

name: Spearhead
in_game_description: Attack a single foe with a polearm, and act earlier on your next turn
notes: Makes you act first next turn, before even people that are guarding. Only enemies recovering from break go earlier (at least, that I've noticed)

name: Incite
in_game_description: Become more readily targeted by foes for 3 turns
notes: Seems to have a very high success rate. Enemy physical attacks will almost always target an incited character. Note there is no Diffusion flag, i.e. unaffected by Transfer Rune

name: Cross Strike
in_game_description: Unleash a sword attack on a single foe

name: Stout Wall
in_game_description: Increase the user's physical defence for 3 turns
notes: Grants P.Def up buff (2/3x physical damage taken)

name: Thousand Spears
in_game_description: Attack random foes with a polearm 5 to 10 times
notes: -90 hit ratio at no boost, rising by 10 for each boost level up to -60 at max boost. Boosting does seem to improve accuracy considerably, as does your aim stat, though it is believed the enemies evade does not factor in to accuracy. No matter what, will always land a minimum of 3 hits.

name: Brand's Thunder
in_game_description: Unleash a tremendously powerful sword attack on a single foe.

name: Lion Dance
in_game_description: One ally's physical attacks become more powerful for 2 turns
notes: Grants P.Atk up buff (1.5x physical damage)

name: Moonlight Waltz
in_game_description: Deal heavy dark damage to a single foe.

name: Peacock Strut
in_game_description: Augment a single ally's elemental attacks for 2 turns
notes: Grants E.Atk up buff (1.5x elemental damage)

name: Mole Dance
in_game_description: Augment a single ally's physical defence for 2 turns
notes: Grants P.Def up buff (2/3x physical damage taken)

name: Night Ode
in_game_description: Deal dark damage to all foes

name: Panther Dance
in_game_description: Increase a single ally's speed for 2 turns.
notes: Grants Speed up buff (1.5x speed in battle).

name: Bewildering Grace
in_game_description: Cause a curious effect to occur one time.
notes: Higher Boost tends to add more dramatic effects (bigger good effects, bigger bad effects). Of note you can only get JPx100 or EXPx100 at max boost. See Readme for link to table of effects

name: Sealticge's Seduction
in_game_description: For 3 turns, skills performed by a single ally that usually target one foe will affect all foes instead. (This will not affect divine skills)
notes: Despite the description, this also causes all abilities that target one ally to instead target all allies as well. See the "Skill All" flag on the right to see what abilities it affects.

name: First Aid
in_game_description: Restore HP to a single ally.

name: Icicle
in_game_description: Deal ice damage to a single foe.

name: Rehabilitate
in_game_description: Cure a single ally of all status ailments, and render them immune to further ailments for 2 turns
notes: Only affects status ailments. Does not affect debuffs.

name: Amputation
in_game_description: Unleash an axe attack on a single foe
notes: Has a -40 hit ratio penalty but +100 critical ratio bonus, meaning it is significantly less accuracy but criticals considerably more often. Note that you cannot typically miss a broken enemy

name: Empoison
in_game_description: Poison a single foe for 2 turns
notes: Poison deals just over 1/6th max HP as damage each turn to generic enemies, 1/100th max HP to bosses, and 1/20th max HP to challenges.

name: Vivify
in_game_description: Revive a single incapacitated ally
notes: Only affects dead allies.

name: Last Stand
in_game_description: Attack all foes with an axe, dealing damage inversely proportional to your current HP
notes: Has a +50 hit ratio, making it very accurate. When HP is less than half, damage is multiplied by 1 + 1.5 x (Max HP - Current HP x 2) / Max HP. E.g. at 40% HP, 1.3x multiplier. At 20%, 1.9x multiplier. At near 0%, 2.5x multiplier.

name: Dohter's Charity
in_game_description: For 3 turns, items used by a single chosen ally will affect all.
notes: Works with Alfyn's Concoct, as well as items that affect a single enemy. See Item All flag column.

name: Steal
in_game_description: Steal an item from a single foe
notes: Odds of success vary with enemy HP. Success % rate is: (100 - 100 x enemy current HP / enemy max HP) + Ability Ratio bonus. Item stolen varies by enemy.

name: Wildfire
in_game_description: Deal heavy fire damage to a single foe.

name: HP Thief
in_game_description: Attack a single foe twice with a dagger, and steal HP equivalent to half of the damage dealt
notes: If the attack kills, HP recovered = half the defeated foe's remaining HP

name: Shackle Foe
in_game_description: Reduce a single foe's physical attack strength for 2 turns.
notes: Inflicts P.Atk down on enemy (0.67x physical damage dealt)

name: Armour Corrosive
in_game_description: Reduce a single foe's physical defence for 2 turns.
notes: Inflicts P.Def down on enemy (1.5x physical damage taken)

name: Steal SP
in_game_description: Attack a single foe twice with a dagger, and steal SP equivalent to 5% of the damage dealt
notes: If the attack kills, SP recovered = 5% of the defeated foe's remaining HP

name: Share SP
in_game_description: Bestow SP equivalent to 50% of one's current SP to a single ally
notes: Can overfill targets SP (remains above max until end of battle). When boosted user will be reduced to 0 SP, but 100%-200% of their current SP will be donated to target

name: Aeber's Reckoning
in_game_description: Attack all foes with a dagger, dealing damage proportional to your speed
notes: Base damage calculation based on P.Atk as normal. Damage is then multiplied by (1+ Speed / 400). In battle Speed buffs are applied here as well. (Note: This extra damage has been calculated only through testing and not datamine)

name: Rain of Arrows
in_game_description: Attack random foes 5 to 8 times with a bow
notes: -90 hit ratio at no boost, rising by 10 for each boost level up to -60 at max boost. Boosting does seem to improve accuracy considerably, as does your aim stat, though it is believed the enemies evade does not factor in to accuracy. No matter what, will always land a minimum of 3 hits.

name: True Strike
in_game_description: Deal critical damage with a bow to a single foe
notes: +30 Hit Ratio and +100 Critical Ratio, but also has a flag set to guarantee criticals anyway

name: Thunderbird
in_game_description: Deal heavy lightning daamge to a single foe
notes: Does not have a DisableMagic flag

name: Leghold Trap
in_game_description: Cause a single foe to act at the end of the turn for 2 turns
notes: Does not apply on the current turn. Applies to next turn, including applying to the next turn when it wears off.

name: Mercy Strike
in_game_description: Attack a single foe with a bow. Otherwise lethal attacks will instead leave the target with 1 HP
notes: Deals at most (enemies current HP - 1) damage. Can deal 0 damage as a result.

name: Arrowstorm
in_game_description: Attack all foes 5 to 8 times with a bow
notes: -90 hit ratio at no boost, rising by 10 for each boost level up to -60 at max boost. Boosting does seem to improve accuracy considerably, as does your aim stat, though it is believed the enemies evade does not factor in to accuracy. No matter what, will always land a minimum of 3 hits.

name: Take Aim
in_game_description: Increase all allies' critical rate and accuracy for 2 turns
notes: Grants Accuracy up buff (1.5x accuracy) and Critical up buff (1.5x critical)

name: Draefendi's Rage
in_game_description: Unleash a highly powerful bow attack on all foes

name: Shooting Stars
in_game_description: Deal wind, light and dark damage to all foes
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet. Attack hits Wind, Light, Dark elements in this order.

name: BP Boost
in_game_description: Allow a single ally to gain 2 BP per turn for 2 turns.
notes: Additional BP regeneration only takes effect if target didn't boost the previous turn

name: Divination
in_game_description: Increase a single ally's critical hit rate for 2 turns.
notes: Grants guaranteed critical buff to ally - all of their physical attacks will crit, for 1.25x normal damage

name: Starsong
in_game_description: Augment a single ally's physical defence, elemental defence, speed and evasion for 2 turns
notes: Grants all of the buff named separately

name: Celestial Intervention
in_game_description: For 2 turns, render a single foe unable to receive attribute augmentations, or a single ally immune to attribute penalties.
notes: When affected by Sealticge's Seduction, can target all allies and enemies, granting the buff/debuff to all. Only grants immunity to debuffs, does not protect from status ailments.

name: Etheral Healing
in_game_description: Grant HP regeneration to all allies for 2 turns
notes: Grants HP regen status, which heals 10% max HP per turn. Same buff as granted by some equipment and skills and does not stack with it.

name: Moon's Reflection
in_game_description: Grant a single ally the ability to counter physical damage one time.
notes: Lasts until attacked physically. Does not reflect or prevent damage, just allows a counterattack after. Counterattack is named "Eye for an Eye", same as Dancer support ability

name: Steorra's Prophecy
in_game_description: Unleash an elemental attack on all foes that deals damage proportional to the party's current BP.
notes: Multiplies damage by (1 + 0.2 x total party BP). The user spends their BP before triggering the move, so it does not count towards the total - meaning the max bonus is 4.4x with 17 BP.

name: Fire Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional fire damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Fiery Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Ice Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional ice damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Icy Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Thunder Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional lightning damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Shocking Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Wind Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional wind damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Windy Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Dark Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional dark damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Shadowy Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Light Rune
in_game_description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional light damage for 3 turns
notes: Adds Bright Pursuit to physical attacks (see Elemental Pursuit below)

name: Transfer Rune
in_game_description: For 3 turns, skills that normally target yourself alone will target your allies as well.
notes: Only affects self targeting moves. See the diffusion flag on right for moves affected.

name: Balogar's Blade
in_game_description: Deal damage from each of the six elements (fire, ice, lightning, wind, light, and darkness) to a single foe.
notes: Order of damage is the same as listed in game.

name: Elemental Pursuit
in_game_description: none
notes: While Rune buff is active, Pursuit triggers after any physical attack with the Enchant flag, hitting the same enemies the previous attack targeted. Pursuits are not affected by boosting or BP Eater. They trigger once per physical attack attempted, even if that attack hits multiple times. The damage of elemental pursuits is based on the E.Atk of the weapon used for the previous attack. Also has a +100 hit modifier.

name: Guardian Liondog
in_game_description: Unleash 5 to 10 sword attacks against random foes
notes: -90 hit ratio at no boost, rising by 10 for each boost level up to -60 at max boost. Boosting does seem to improve accuracy considerably, as does your aim stat, though it is believed the enemies evade does not factor in to accuracy. No matter what, will always land a minimum of 3 hits.

name: Tiger Rage
in_game_description: Unleash an axe attack on all foes

name: Qilin's Horn
in_game_description: Unleash a polearm attack on a single foe

name: Yatagarasu
in_game_description: Unleash a dagger attack on all foes

name: Fox Spirit
in_game_description: Unleash a staff attack on all foes

name: Phoenix Storm
in_game_description: Unleash a bow attack on a single foe

name: Nightmare Chimera
in_game_description: Unleash an attack on a single foe using a weapon of your choice. The weapon will be destroyed
notes: Unknown exactly how this works. Seems to be vaguely quadratic damage with the P.Atk of the weapon selected, but not quite. I have no idea what is going on with the ability ratio either, but this is how it is in game.

name: Winnehild's Battle Cry
in_game_description: Wield six weapons to unleash six attacks on all foes
notes: Seems to add about half of each weapons P.Atk value to your P.Atk (on top of the normal amount for that weapon) when calculating damage for it. Seems to also be a bit glitchy with regards to damage when breaking and hitting weak points, sometimes damage is calculated as though enemies are not broken at all. Also seems to increase damage slightly more when calculating attacks with very weak/makeshift weapons. Finally, values are approximate. There is likely something else going on with the damage output of this skill that hasn't been discovered yet.

name: Ignis Ardere
in_game_description: Deal fire damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Glacies Claudere
in_game_description: Deal ice damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Tonitrus Canere
in_game_description: Deal lightning damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Ventus Saltare
in_game_description: Deal wind damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Lux Congerere
in_game_description: Deal light damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Tenebrae Operire
in_game_description: Deal dark damage to all foes 3 times
notes: Note that Lv. 3 boost is +74 instead of +72 over previous boost level. This is an error in game, not in this sheet.

name: Elemental Break
in_game_description: Unleash a powerful staff attack on a single foe that also reduces the target's elemental defence for 2 turns
notes: Also increases debuff duration by 2 turns per BP spent. Inflicts E.Def down debuff on enemy (1.5x elemental damage taken)

name: Dreisang's Spell
in_game_description: For 3 turns, elemental attacks performed by a single chosen ally will hit for critical damage
notes: Enables target to always crit with elemental attacks, for 1.25x damage. That's all it does.
